title: Organ donation rate in the United Kingdom 2018/19 , by country
yAxis: Rate of donation per million population
summary: This statistic shows the Rate donation in the Organ , England and Northern_Ireland in .
A little over 23.0 million vehicles were produced in Northern_Ireland .
In 2013 , Northern_Ireland edged past England to become North America 's second largest Rate producer .
gold: In 2018/19 , the organ donation rate in Wales was 30.7 per million population , the highest rate in the United Kingdom.
With 24.5 organ donations per million population , England had the second highest rate.
Scotland had the lowest rate of the countries of the UK .
